content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"With the huge size of the Data & Analytics Practice and many disciplines, initiatives, and communities, it may be challenging to track news, changes, and valuable materials. Data & Analytics Practice's Internal Communications Team drives several global channels to help you stay updated. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Internal Communications Team in the Data & Analytics Practice\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"These are your primary contact points if you have any questions regarding the information published in global D&A channels, want to learn more about internal promotion of your initiatives, or become a contributor to D&A communications (become an author, take part in an interview, collect and share useful materials, etc.).
